column1: Uchi////i must admit that i am spoiled with restaurants in my hometown of chicago so while i had somewhat high expecatations for Uchi given the reviews and word of mouth
column2: i was indeed satisfied and quite impressed with the service
column4: and the overall execution of each dish we had. we gave our waiter (a fabulous guy from new zealand) a price point and had him choose our menu. everything was a stand out. ...our favorites were the bacon tataki
column5: hama chili and machi cure (the machi cure was just ridiculous!). the sashimi pieces were extremely fresh but my only complaint was that a few of the pieces
column7: was seasoned a bit much with a strong cracked pepper.
